title: Cang Yuan Tu
overview: The story tells the story of Meng Chuan, the protagonist, who has made a vow to avenge his mother's death since he was a child and takes the Mirror Lake Daoist College as his starting point. With his resolute and fearless heart and decisive sword skills, he punishes the evil, destroys the demons, ascends to the top of the four Daoist Colleges, becomes famous in the Dongning Province, pays homage to the Yuanchu Mountain, and achieves a generation of gods and demons.(DeepL)
